ftbquests.chapter.tetra.title: Tetra[--Tetra--]
ftbquests.chapter.tetra.quests0.title: Tetra Time![--Tetra时间!--]
ftbquests.chapter.tetra.quests0.subtitle: It's not a fish, it's a hammer[--这不是鱼,是锤子--]
ftbquests.chapter.tetra.quests0.descript: &eTetra&r is a very powerful &6modular tool and weapon crafting mod&r.[--&eTetra&r是一种非常强大的&6模块化工具和武器制作mod&r.--]
Using the crafting methods described here, you'll be able to create &6highly customized tools&r that can be further enhanced and enchanted.[--使用这里描述的制作方法,你就可以制作&6高度自定义的工具&r,可以进一步增强和附魔.--]

Craft one of these &blow-tier Hammers&r, and use it on a vanilla Crafting Table to get a &6Workbench&r, where tools are modified and created.[--制作一个&b更亮的锤子&r,然后在原版工作台上使用它来获得新的&6工作台&r,所有工具的修改和创建都在那.--]
This will also give you the &6Holosphere&r, Tetra's in-game manual.[--给你&6全息球&r,Tetra's in-game手册.--]
ftbquests.chapter.tetra.quests1.title: Basic Tinkering[--基础工匠--]
ftbquests.chapter.tetra.quests1.subtitle: Swapping parts[--交换零件--]
ftbquests.chapter.tetra.quests1.descript: Tetra tools are made by &6modifying vanilla tools&r, done by inserting them into the Workbench. You don't craft tools; you &6swap parts of existing ones&r instead.[--Tetra工具由&6调整原版工具&r制作,通过将其嵌入工作台完成。我们不制作工具;我们只&6Swap更改现有的工具&r.--]

Certain tool parts require you &6have a specific tool, of a specific level, in your inventory&r. For example, to modify a Stone Hammer (which is a tier 2 Hammer) so it's made of Iron instead (a tier 3 Hammer material), you need to have another tier 2 Hammer in your inventory.[--某些工具零件需要你&6在物品栏中&r拥有一个特定等级的特殊工具才能制作.例如,要修改石锤(是2级锤子),它由铁制成(3级锤子材料),你需要在物品栏中拥有另一个2级锤子.--]
There are a ton of parts to mix and match; &6experiment and find what's best for you&r![--有一堆零件可以混合和匹配;&6自己实验，然找到最适合你的东西&r!--]
ftbquests.chapter.tetra.quests2.title: Tier 3 Hammer[--3级锤子--]
ftbquests.chapter.tetra.quests2.subtitle: This is my Hammer-making Hammer![--用锤子制作锤子!--]
ftbquests.chapter.tetra.quests2.descript: &6Wood&r and &6Stone Hammers&r are tier 1 and tier 2 Hammers respectively, but can be crafted directly.[--&6木锤&r和&6石锤&r是一级和二级锤子,可以直接制作.--]
Rather, to be more accurate, they are &ctier 0 and 1&r. However, using the same material for both Heads increases the level by one.[--实际上,为了更精确,它们是&c第0级和1级&r.使用相同的材料使两个锤头等级增加1级.--]
The &bIron&r Hammer&r is tier 2, but if both heads are made of iron they get synergy bonus and the hammer becomes &6tier 3&r.[--&b铁锤&r是第2级的,但如果两个头都是铁制的,它们会得到协同奖励,锤子会变成&63级&r.--]
To install these heads, a &6Tier 2 Hammer&r must be in your inventory.[--要安装这些锤头,你的库存中必须有一个&6二级锤子&r.--]
The task need a Hammer with both Iron Hammer heads, the rest of the parts do not matter. [--这项任务需要一个铁锤头,其他部分并不重要。--]
ftbquests.chapter.tetra.quests3.title: Tier 4 Hammer[--4级锤子--]
ftbquests.chapter.tetra.quests3.subtitle: Bringing the hammer down[--扳倒锤子--]
ftbquests.chapter.tetra.quests3.descript: &bBlackstone&r is a tier 3 hammer material, which means using it twice makes a &6tier 4 Hammer&r.[--&b黑石&r是3级锤子材料,这意味着使用它两次可以制作&64级锤子&r.--]
There are several ways to get Blackstone, the easiest being a &6Material Generator Pedestal&r on a Block of Coal.[--有几种获取黑石的方法,最简单的方法是在煤块上安装&6材料生成基座&r.--]
ftbquests.chapter.tetra.quests4.subtitle: Rackem up![--挂起来!--]
ftbquests.chapter.tetra.quests4.descript: Tetra crafting can become a bit of a mess, with &6needing multiple tools&r to perform various functions all &6in your inventory&r at the same time.[--Tetra合成可能会变得有点乱,因为&6需要&6物品栏&r中的多种工具&r来同时执行各种功能..--]
By placing a &bRack&r near your Workbench, you can have the tool-crafting tools there instead![--通过将&b架子&r放置在工作台附近,你就可以用工具架制作其他工具了!--]
ftbquests.chapter.tetra.quests5.title: Tier 4 Chopping Tool[--4级砧板工具--]
ftbquests.chapter.tetra.quests5.subtitle: And my axe![--还有我的斧子!--]
ftbquests.chapter.tetra.quests5.descript: &bChopping Tools&r are needed in many recipes.[--许多配方都需要&b砧板工具&r.--]
The easiest way to make one is to simply &6replace the Axe Head&r on a vanilla Iron Axe with another Iron Axe Head.[--最简单的制作方法就是将原版铁斧&6替换为另一个铁质斧头&r.--]
ftbquests.chapter.tetra.quests6.title: Diamond Shortblade[--钻石短剑刃--]
ftbquests.chapter.tetra.quests6.subtitle: Tier 4 Cutting Tool[--4级切割工具--]
ftbquests.chapter.tetra.quests6.descript: Many advanced recipes need a &bTier 3+ Short Blade&r to act as a cutting tool. [--许多高级配方需要一个&b3级+短刃&r来作为切割工具.--]
The easiest way to make one is by taking a &6vanilla Diamond Sword&r and swapping out the blade with a &6Diamond Shortblade&r.[--最简单的制作方法就是拿起&6原版钻石剑&r用&6钻石短剑&r来切换剑刃.--]
ftbquests.chapter.tetra.quests7.subtitle: Enchanting with Tetra[--Tetra附魔--]
ftbquests.chapter.tetra.quests7.descript: Tetra tools can be &6enchanted&r, either in the &bEnchanting Table&r or by installing an Enchanted Book onto a tool part.[--Tetra工具可以在&b附魔台&r中或将附魔书安装在工具上,&6附魔&r.--]
Different parts have different &6magic capacity&r - it's best to &cavoid exceeding it&r, as it can have adverse effects...[--不同的零件有不同的&6魔法容量&r - 最好&c避免超过上限&r,因为它可能具有负面效果...--]
ftbquests.chapter.tetra.quests8.title: Tool Leveling[--工具升级--]
ftbquests.chapter.tetra.quests8.subtitle: Take it to the limit![--把它拉到极限!--]
ftbquests.chapter.tetra.quests8.descript: You'll notice in the Workbench menu, your tool has &6several stats important for upgrading it&r. These are Integrity, Honing, and Settling.[--你会在工作台菜单中看到,你的工具有&6几组数据对升级&r很重要.分别是完整性、磨损和沉降.--]

&bSettling&r is the easiest, and happens naturally over time. As you &6use the tool&r, it will gradually settle. A fully settled tool has a &6lower integrity cost&r.[--&b沉降&r最简单,随着时间的推移自然会发生。当你&6使用工具&r时,它会逐渐解决。一个完全固定的工具有&6更低的完整度成本&r.--]
&bHoning&r is increased the same way, but will &6boost a tool part&r when honed.[--&b磨损&r也是这样增加的,但打磨时会&6加速工具部件磨损&r.--]

&bIntegrity&r is basically the &6maximum overall complexity&r of the tool. Better tool parts have higher integrity cost, and you &ccannot exceed max&r. Increasing Settling and Honing will allow for more Integrity to be used.[--&b完整性&r是是工具的&6最大整体复杂度的根本&r.更好的工具零件的完整度成本更高,当然你&c不能超过最大值&r.提高磨损和沉降可以让你的工具有更高的完整度.--]
ftbquests.chapter.tetra.quests9.subtitle: Get a Thermal Cell[--获得热力单元--]
ftbquests.chapter.tetra.quests9.descript: &bThermal Cells&r can be installed on two sides of the Forge Hammer to &6power it&r, allowing for higher tier tools and weapons.[--&b热力单元&r可以安装在锻造锤两侧,&6充能它&r,允许有更高等级的工具和武器.--]
ftbquests.chapter.tetra.quests10.descrip: In order to progress beyond T4 tools, you'll need several new devices. First and foremost is the &bForge Hammer&r.[--为了超越T4工具,你需要几个新的设备。首先,是&b锻造锤&r.--]

Normally, you'd find these hidden deep underground, but that's not really an option here. Instead, &6purchase one from a Tier 5 Armorer Villager&r. Place a Blast Furnace to set the Villager's profession.[--通常，你会发现这些隐藏在地下深处，但这并不是一个真正的选择。取而代之的是，从 5 级盔甲村民那里购买一个。放置一个高炉来设置村民的职业。--]
The Forge Hammer must be placed &62 blocks above the Workbench&r.[--锻造锤必须在工作台上方&62方块&r放置.--]
The Forge Hammer can have &6upgrades&r installed. Use a &6Claw&r tool to remove them.[--FE锤可以安装&6升级&r.使用&6爪子&r工具移除.--]
ftbquests.chapter.tetra.quests11.descrip: To reach &6Tier 7&r, the Forge Hammer alone isn't enough.[--要达到&6第7级&r,单靠锻造锤并不够.--]
You'll need to upgrade it with both the &bCombustion Chamber&r as well as the &bLubrication Dispenser&r.[--您需要用&b燃烧室&r和&b润滑发射器&r来升级它.--]
ftbquests.chapter.tetra.quests12.descrip: &bScrolls&r, which can be found in chests in villages, &6unlock new crafting options in the Workbench&r when placed nearby.[--卷轴可以在村庄的宝箱中找到，当放置在附近时，可以在工作台中解锁新的制作选项.--]
Multiple Scrolls can be placed in the same block.[--多个卷轴可以放置在同一个方块中.--]
